name: timeless (itch) (LakshyaIsAGod)
description:
The world has ended... tiny monsters have occupied the lands. It seems as if all hope is lost.... but what if..... Rewind time and save the world!

You, the player, have the ability to rewind time and redo your past actions and decisions. 

Using this ability, you must carefully craft your actions and decisions to ensure that the world doesn't end after all.

CONTROLS

A,D -> Movement

LShift -> Time Travel

S -> Dash

Left Click -> Spell

Right Click -> Ground Smash

E -> Interact with NPCs

C -> Climb Flagpoles

CREDITS

Programming, Development and all of that stuff ~ LJ

Playtesting ~ RJ

Ideas ~ VJ

dis just a proof of concept I've been coding for 18 hours straight AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH
